definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Santanas, especially the new 2000models, have become big sellers.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔纳，特别是现代2000，拥有众多的买家。

sentences.english: In an emergency, buyers under duress have no freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在紧急关头，买家迫不得已别无选择。

sentences.english: European bond markets continued to creak as buyers remained scarce.
sentences.chinese: 由于买家稀少，欧洲债券市场仍处于勉力维持的境地。

sentences.english: But as an American buyer, I really like China.
sentences.chinese: 但作为一个美国买家，我真的很喜欢中国。

sentences.english: In the world of international marketing, governments, quasi- government agencies, and profit-seeking and nonprofit entities are frequently buyers.
sentences.chinese: 以及赢利与非赢利实体都经常充当买家的角色。

sentences.english: He was also accused of forcing buyers to purchase water-injected meat.
sentences.chinese: 他还被指控迫使买家购买注水肉。

sentences.english: Buyers often pay entirely in cash.
sentences.chinese: 而该品牌买家通常选择现金全款支付。

sentences.english: However, many mooncake buyers expressed their dismay at the overly-elaborated boxes.
sentences.chinese: 然而许多月饼买家对过分精美的盒子表示了不满。

sentences.english: And they glanced around so seductively in their humiliation in search of a buyer !
sentences.chinese: 在这样的羞耻中，他们又是那样的诱惑着寻找买家。

sentences.english: As soon as a tuna is sold at auction, it is hauled off to the buyer's stall by cart.
sentences.chinese: 一旦金枪鱼拍卖成功，就会由卡车运送到买家的货摊。

sentences.english: Sius American, Inc. is a foreign buyer from United States, need to purchase.
sentences.chinese: 该公司是一家来自美国的买家。

sentences.english: We finance more manufactured-home buyers than any other company.
sentences.chinese: 我们比其他公司更多地向预制房屋的买家提供融资。

sentences.english: The beams can not move heedlessly , buyers have to qualify to reduce visual impairment.
sentences.chinese: 由于梁柱不能乱动，买家只好以修饰减少视觉障碍。

sentences.english: You've got all ages and genders.
sentences.chinese: 买家分布含栝各种年龄和性别。

sentences.english: The Longjing tea is one of China's best green teas. It has been a favourite among wealthy buyers.
sentences.chinese: 龙井茶是中国最好的绿茶之一，是富有买家的宠儿。

sentences.english: Buyers like these apartments as they are similar to rare jewellery.
sentences.chinese: 买家喜欢这些公寓，它们就像稀有的珠宝一样。

definition: to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
